title: Cloud card
data:
***Version [0.25](/0.25 "0.25")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                   |
| - | ------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The card depicts an iron gate enshrouded in mist. |

The Cloud card surrounds all hostile monsters in sight with opaque [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud") of black smoke, with average duration depending on power level:

- Power level 0: 5 turns
- Power level 1: 8 turns
- Power level 2: 11 turns

The smoke initially covers every hostile creature in view and all tiles adjacent to them, then begins to drift. Note that this is not guaranteed to break line of sight to a lone target.

It is found in the following [decks](/Decks "Decks"):

| [0.15](/0.15 "0.15")                                                                        | [0.16](/0.16 "0.16")                                                                     | [0.17](/0.17 "0.17")                                                                     | [0.18](/0.18 "0.18")                                                                     | [0.19](/0.19 "0.19") and beyond            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| [Destruction](/Deck_of_destruction "Deck of destruction") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Defence](/Deck_of_defence "Deck of defence") [Escape](/Deck_of_escape "Deck of escape") | [Defence](/Deck_of_defence "Deck of defence") [Escape](/Deck_of_escape "Deck of escape") | [Defence](/Deck_of_defence "Deck of defence") [Escape](/Deck_of_escape "Deck of escape") | [Escape](/Deck_of_escape "Deck of escape") |

## See also

- [Cards](/Cards "Cards")
- [Decks](/Decks "Decks")

## History

- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), the Cloud card surrounded enemies with a variety of damaging clouds instead of smoke.
- In the simplification of decks in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), the Cloud card was one of 23 cards to be kept, now appearing only in the deck of escape.

* Prior to 0.16, it would simply disperse a number of flame clouds or freezing vapours anywhere in sight (except ontop of players and allies), the number dependent on card power level.

- The Cloud card was introduced in [0.15](/0.15 "0.15") as a repurposing alteration of [the Flame](/Flame_card "Flame card") card, which was eliminated.
- In [0.15](/0.15 "0.15") the cloud card used to surround enemies with clouds of either fire or cold.

| Decks                                                             | [Nemelex](/Nemelex "Nemelex")'s [Cards](/Cards "Cards")                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Deck of destruction](/Deck_of_destruction "Deck of destruction") | [Degeneration](/Degeneration_card "Degeneration card") • [The Orb](/Orb_card "Orb card") • [Pain](/Pain_card "Pain card") • [The Storm](/Storm_card "Storm card") • [Vitriol](/Vitriol_card "Vitriol card") • [Wild Magic](/Wild_Magic_card "Wild Magic card")                    |
| [Deck of escape](/Deck_of_escape "Deck of escape")                | [The Cloud]() • [The Elixir](/Elixir_card "Elixir card") • [Exile](/Exile_card "Exile card") • [The Tomb](/Tomb_card "Tomb card") • [Velocity](/Velocity_card "Velocity card")                                                                                                    |
| [Deck of summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning")       | [The Dance](/Dance_card "Dance card") • [The Elements](/Elements_card "Elements card") • [The Illusion](/Illusion_card "Illusion card") • [The Swarm](/Swarm_card "Swarm card") • [The Pentagram](/Pentagram_card "Pentagram card") • [The Rangers](/Rangers_card "Rangers card") |
| [Deck of punishment](/Deck_of_punishment "Deck of punishment")    | [Swine](/Swine_card "Swine card") • [Torment](/Torment_card "Torment card") • [Wraith](/Wraith_card "Wraith card") • [Wrath](/Wrath_card "Wrath card")                                                                                                                            |

Cloud card

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.25: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
The card depicts an iron gate enshrouded in mist.

The Cloud card surrounds all hostile monsters in sight with opaque clouds of black smoke, with average duration depending on power level:

  • Power level 0: 5 turns
  • Power level 1: 8 turns
  • Power level 2: 11 turns

The smoke initially covers every hostile creature in view and all tiles adjacent to them, then begins to drift. Note that this is not guaranteed to break line of sight to a lone target.

It is found in the following decks:

0.15 0.16 0.17 0.18 0.19 and beyond

History

  • Prior to 0.25, the Cloud card surrounded enemies with a variety of damaging clouds instead of smoke.
  • In the simplification of decks in 0.19, the Cloud card was one of 23 cards to be kept, now appearing only in the deck of escape.
  • Prior to 0.16, it would simply disperse a number of flame clouds or freezing vapours anywhere in sight (except ontop of players and allies), the number dependent on card power level.
  • The Cloud card was introduced in 0.15 as a repurposing alteration of the Flame card, which was eliminated.
  • In 0.15 the cloud card used to surround enemies with clouds of either fire or cold.
Decks Nemelex's Cards
Deck of destruction Degeneration • The Orb • Pain • The Storm • Vitriol • Wild Magic
Deck of escape The Cloud • The Elixir • Exile • The Tomb • Velocity
Deck of summoning The Dance • The Elements • The Illusion • The Swarm • The Pentagram • The Rangers
